item.title: Configure Microsoft SQL Server Auditing
item.description: If you are a system administrator who works with SQL Server, you know how important it is to audit your SQL Server instances and databases.

item.title: Password managers and why you should be using one
item.description: Let me ask you some questions: Do you have that one account that you only have to log into once in a blue moon, and you pretty much always have to reset the password?
